snippet.title: Crossfire: Legion - Early-Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A new generation of warfare!

Commanders, release day has arrived. Crossfire: Legion is now available on Steam! 
Crossfire: Legion is a real time strategy game featuring tactical action in furious battles across a shattered version of the near future. Raise and customize your army to engage in intense online combat and carve your own path as you rise through the ranks.

For more information – 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1072190/Crossfire_Legion/
Website: https://crossfirelegion.primematter.gg 
Follow us or join us on: Discord: https://discord.gg/8MrVJbyr2v 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CF_Legion 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CrossfireLegion
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/crossfirelegion
